content: What's the name of the 19th-century British author known for his vivid characters and tales set in London, such as "Oliver Twist" and "A Christmas Carol"?

That would be Charles Dickens. He's one of the most famous English novelists of the Victorian era, known for his richly descriptive narratives and memorable characters. "Oliver Twist" and "A Christmas Carol" are indeed two of his most renowned works.
